item.title: [PI] WildernessReLoaded Realease[No-AntiLeech]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:95, topic:397676”][quote author=ExQlusive link=topic=494813.msg3752748#msg3752748 date=1316180680]
Hey, I know this may be a late post in relation to the last post, but how can you make this server/client available for other people to get on? Is there a way to edit the IP in the client so people can go on? I’ve tried using 317 IP Changers but none work for this source. Thanks in advance.
[/quote]You must forward your ports and set up an No-IP for your players to connect. Once you’ve done this, just change the IP’s in the client/source to the No-IP you set up.[/quote]

or you use your rl ip.

Read full topic
